adHeader: Private Tutor, Career Guidance and Mentoring
adDetails: Exclusive one-on-one tutoring based on your own strength, weakness and needs. Everyone is different and learns at different pace, acquire knowledge in different learning styles. We can accommodate your own schedule to achieve your personal goals. A comprehensive planning according to you life-goal, test objectives is evaluated first. We don't group random students in one class and teach at below average rate. We help you to get to your immediate goals first, then extend that to beyond anyone's widest dreams and we have done this for multiple individuals. If you are interested in engineering, sciences, economics, statistics, you need us to help you in achieving your immediate academic goal and to prepare you for future challenges. Tiger Woods learned how to play golf when he was 3 years old. Mozart started composing when he was 5. Human brain is the first organ to deteriorate at a young age of 25. In some areas, ability to learn, capacity to learn diminishes before age of 25. You can be an expert in one area or another if you start achieving your immediate goals early. That's how Gates, Jobs did it. Let our expertise to work for you or your loved ones. + Summer accelerated courses include basic math, algebra I & II, trigonometry, geometry, college algebra, pre-calc, calculus and statistics at high school, honors, AP level and college level. Science courses include chemistry, physics.
